Title: Performance Review System Design
Description: Created comprehensive design document for the new performance review tracking system, including detailed architecture, data models, and implementation plans.
Acceptance Criteria: Complete technical specification approved by stakeholders
Success Notes: Design document received positive feedback and serves as the blueprint for implementation

Title: VS Code Integration Setup
Description: Configured VS Code development environment with Python tools and custom Roo Code integration for performance review analysis
Acceptance Criteria: Working development environment with all required tools
Success Notes: Successfully set up linting, formatting, and custom analyst mode

Title: Team Documentation Standards
Description: Developed and implemented new documentation standards for the team, improving clarity and consistency across projects
Acceptance Criteria: Clear guidelines and templates for different doc types
Success Notes: Team reported 40% reduction in time spent on documentation reviews
